titleStmt.title: (A key to the colourization may be found at: http://oracc.museum.upenn.edu/doc/user/teicolours.html.)X202021 = AD -202A

w.lemma: na[time interval between the rising of a planet and sunrise viz. sunset and the setting of a planet//rising to sunrise]N
